Great work! For Paranormal Activity, a really great idea would be to add a separate file with just the alternate ending. It would save having to DL both complete versions. Thanx again for a fantastic service!

Should have mentioned... for Paranormal Activity... the REFiNED and BestHD rips are 1280x720... WTF is that? That's a 16/9 TV ratio... must have black bars. Need to strip those and set 1280x688 (1.85 AR). Defining the edges of black bars takes up a lot of video bitrate; so best to crop them out when you re-encode. Unless the Blu-ray image has been adapted for wide-screen TV at the source... ???
